channel.title: Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Andrewlock.net on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Creating a software bill of materials (SBOM) for an open-source NuGet package
item.description: In this post I discuss several tools you can use to create a software bill of materials (SBOM) for an application or a NuGet package Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-a-software-bill-of-materials-sbom-for-an-open-source-nuget-package/

item.title: Creating provenance attestations for NuGet packages in GitHub Actions
item.description: In this post I discuss software provenance, what attestations say about your software, how they work, and how to create an attestation for a NuGet package Link to article: https://andrewlock.net/creating-provenance-attestations-for-nuget-packages-in-github-actions/
